data.description: Query Sender Permitted From status in DNS
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
SPF is an extension to SMTP which weakly authenticates senders; if
    widely adopted, it will help fight spam, viruses, worms and fraud,
    by first fighting envelope sender domain forgery.

    SPF has to do with email: hence Mail::SPF.

    This is a query library: hence Mail::SPF::Query. Other libraries
    may help configure local BIND or djbdns installations.
